Reviews.Title: “What a dump”

Reviews.Content: booked deluxe july 2011 seeing website photo modern apartment 2 month holiday australia walked mid 1980s time warp fashioned dark dirty frayed carpets badly stained chairs sofa tiny bathroom fittings stained scratched broken compained reassured indeed booked eventually 24 hours upgraded premium exactly bigger added extras net curtains badly fitted curtains despite looking directly office block single glazed windows tendency runners crockery mismatched chipped badly worn utensils cooker food preparation repeatedly told building refurbishment booked advertising literature gross misrepresentation shrug shoulders please dont disappointed paying fortune dont book hotel apartment block

Reviews.Title: “So Slow”

Reviews.Content: stayed december 2011 booked check arriving train waiting half check told ready attending business lunch option changed clothes toilet attending luncheon arrived hotel 300pm told ready left sitting foyer due bad weather husband wet looking forward changing dry clothes waited half hour husband approached desk complained poor service finally 7 hours trying booked days advance service disgrace
